children.text:
Let me outline the code structure. program main

implicit none

integer :: n, i, k, a(0:999), flag, oddCount

character(len=4) :: first_result, second_result, third_result

! Read n

read(*,*) n

! First part: compute first_result

a = 0

i =0

k =0

do while (k <=n)

   i = mod(i +k, n)

   a(i) = a(i) +1

   k =k +1

end do

flag = 1 ! assume true (1)

do i=0, n-1

   if (a(i) ==0) then

      flag =0

      exit

   end if

end do

if (flag ==1) then

   first_result = "YES"

else

   first_result = "NO"

end if

! Second part: process first_result to get second_result

integer :: counts(0:255) =0

character(len=4) :: input_str = first_result

integer :: len_str, c, j

len_str = len_trim(input_str)

do j=1, len_str

   c = ichar(input_str(j:j))

   counts(c) = counts(c) +1

end do

oddCount =0

do c=0,255

   if (mod(counts(c),2) ==1) then

      oddCount = oddCount +1

   end if

end do

if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. (mod(oddCount,2)/=0) ) then

   second_result = "First"

else

   second_result = "Second"

end if

! Third part: process second_result to get third_result

third_result = second_result

! Replace commas with spaces.
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Output third_result

write(*,'(A)') trim(third_result)

end program main

program main

implicit none

integer :: n, i, k, a(0:999), flag, oddCount

character(len=4) :: first_result, second_result, third_result

! Read n

read(*,*) n

! First part: compute first_result

a = 0

i =0

k =0

do while (k <=n)

   i = mod(i +k, n)

   a(i) = a(i) +1

   k =k +1

end do

flag = 1 ! assume true (1)

do i=0, n-1

   if (a(i) ==0) then

      flag =0

      exit

   end if

end do

if (flag ==1) then

   first_result = "YES"

else

   first_result = "NO"

end if

! Second part: process first_result to get second_result

integer :: counts(0:255) =0

character(len=4) :: input_str = first_result

integer :: len_str, c, j

len_str = len_trim(input_str)

do j=1, len_str

   c = ichar(input_str(j:j))

   counts(c) = counts(c) +1

end do

oddCount =0

do c=0,255

   if (mod(counts(c),2) ==1) then

      oddCount = oddCount +1

   end if

end do

if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. (mod(oddCount,2)/=0) ) then

   second_result = "First"

else

   second_result = "Second"

end if

! Third part: process second_result to get third_result

third_result = second_result

! Replace commas with spaces. Since there are none, it's same.

! But code it properly.

character(len=10) :: temp

temp = second_result

do i=1, len_trim(temp)

   if (temp(i:i) == ',') then

      temp(i:i) = ' '

   end if

end do

third_result = temp

! Output third_result

write(*,'(A)') trim(third_result)

end program main
